summary: Client requested Jordan to run a test; QA reported the test passed with output matching the expected result. PM, Architect, and Developer did not respond to the request.

decisions.title: Test accepted
decisions.details: QA confirmed the test output matches the expected value ('things are good'), so the test is considered passed unless further issues are reported.

sign_offs.what: Approved test; output matches expected: 'things are good'

actions.task: Execute the requested test (per client's request) and confirm results with the team

risks.risk: PM, Architect, and Developer did not address the test request or provide comments
risks.mitigation: Follow up with PM/Architect/Developer for confirmation or assign clear owners and timelines to ensure any issues discovered by QA are triaged and fixed.
